goals: Perform only the minimal amount of weightings to solve the riddle.

member.name: find
member.description: Returns the index of the fake coin.

params.name: scale
params.description: A function that takes two coins or arrays of coins as parameters. It returns value < 0 if the left array is heavier, a value > 0 if the right array is heavier or 0 if the weight of both arrays is the same.

params.name: ...left
params.description: One Coin or array of Coins on the left dish.

params.name: ...right
params.description: One Coin or array of Coins on the right dish.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The number you wrote on the coin to identify it.
